name: We!
description:
THE IDEA:

  • 2D Platforming
  • Easy To win

 

HOW TO PLAY:

  • You can move left and right but 2 player move Together
  • The Second Player or the bottom player move faster than the first player
  • And The first player jump higher

 

HOW TO WIN:

        You need to be Together to win.

 

HOW TO LOSE:

        One of the Player die.

IF YOU ASK WHY THE NAME IS WE?:

        Because : I don’t know what the name so the game name is we.

IF YOU ASK HOW MANY LEVEL:

       There Is 4 Level.
